name: Rem
description: Maid of House Roswaal, skilled housekeeper, powerful fighter!

passiveSkill.name: Oni Form
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Blocks lethal damage 1 time for Rem and restores {placeholder} Rage, increasing DMG Rate by {placeholder} and Lifesteal Rate by {placeholder} for 20 secs. This effect can be triggered once per battle.Lineup Skill: Activation Requirement: Have Ram in the lineup.Activation Effect: When 1 of allied Rem or Ram joins the battle, the other one will join the battle directly at no cost."}

uniqueSkill.name: Morningstar
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Rem strikes an enemy with the iron ball 5 times. Each strike deals Rem's ATK * {placeholder} damage. If the target is dead, the rest strikes will be launched upon the enemies behind it until the strikes finished or no enemies left in this column."}

specialSkill.name: Speedy Stabs
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Rem attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing her ATK by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Sound Lock
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Rem strikes an enemy with the iron ball 5 times. Each strike deals Rem's ATK * {placeholder} damage. If the target is dead, the rest strikes will be launched upon the enemies behind it until the strikes finished or no enemies left in this column.
